name: VoxChazz
description: Are you sometimes getting bored with waiting for your opponent's turn in never ending chess game? Well, in VoxChazz there's simply no time for that! In contrast to classic chess, the intention of the game is to force you to make mistakes. Both players have just 6 seconds to move a piece. By capturing opponent's piece you get certain amount of points (the king can be captured as well). First player to get 30 points wins the game. There is also a combo increased by removing  opponent's pieces which multiplies newly obtained points.
